title: Inner Tube
summaries: The Inner Tube is an accessory that causes the player to float on the surface of liquids instead of sinking to the bottom. The effect can be temporarily negated by holding â–¼ Down. It can be found in Water Chests and Ocean/Seaside Crates.

The Inner Tube's effects are replaced with the <linked>Flipper</linked>'s effect if the player is holding a <linked>Trident</linked>. <linked>Neptune's Shell</linked> and its derivative accessories will override the Inner Tube's effects entirely.

statistics.Tooltip: Grants the ability to float in water
statistics.Sell: 20
